channel.title: design on D00k
channel.description: Recent content in design on D00k

item.title: Colophon
item.description: A comprehensive dive into the design, and creation of this website Background This site was made to scratch an itch I long had. Sharing stuff on social media has never been my mojo, I’ll often post my photography, however I yearned for something more expansive and exciting so I made a website. The first version of the site was made by modifying what I felt was a suitable theme, however I soon became aware of my lack of knowledge in web design and development, scrapping the site soon after I finished it.

item.title: Virtual Gallery
item.description: The Virtual Gallery was born in the summer of 2020 after the cancellation of an exhibition that an art course I was attending hosted. Not wanting the work and effort of everyone I did the course with to go to waste, I set out to make a platform for them to share with their friends and family. The Exhibition Work took several months to build a basic site from scratch using HTML and CSS, largely due to my inexperience however I learned a lot.

item.title: Origami Designs
item.description: Origami Modular Festive Tree The Origami festive tree is a modular origami tree with little slots in the leaves to put whatever you want! It was designed as a modular, flat-packable festive tree that could be practical, allowing you to put different decorations or items in it. The design still needs some tweaking before I’m happy with posting instructions, I’ll probably get around to it soon.

item.title: Famicase Exhibition
item.description: The Famicase Exhibition is an annual exhibition hosted by the Super Meteor store located in Tokyo, Japan. Entry is open to anyone worldwide, and the goal is create a cover for a fictional Famicom game of your creation. Famicase Exhibition 2021 entry - Become The 2021 Famicase Exhibition took place between April 29th and May 31st. ∙ Famicase Website ∙ Purchase the Famicase 2021 Zine
